content: do you love whales sharks and dolphins if so this pattern is perfect you this is basically a 3 in 1 pattern for dolphins sharks and whales they are super quick and easy to make too one only took me an hour maybe two to make with just tiny tweaks you can turn your whale into a dolphin or shark so easy i really hope you ll give these guys a try and make your own little army of maritime friends materials to make a shake/whale/dolphin you will need a crochet hook 2 5mm a yarn in your choice of color main color and white yarn a tapestry needle and scissors stuffing safety eyes i used 9mm a stitch marker to help you keep track of the start of the round please note that you can make them using any size crochet hook and yarn weight for a smaller or bigger result using dk yarn and a 2 5mm crochet hook they should be about 5-7cm tall stitches & abbreviations the pattern is written using us crochet terms in continuous spirals you will need to know the following kinds of stitches to make him magic_ring magic_ring single_crochet single_crochet decrease decrease preferably using the invisible decrease method increase increase if you like what i m doing please consider following me over at twitter @rinamogrynaart and/or supporting me on ko-fi @rinamogryna <3
